verbose_text: Although bath application of NBQX (10 muM), the AMPA / kainate receptor antagonist, significantly decreased predrug AP discharge rate in spontaneously active neurons (-58.8 +/- 40.4% change from predrug baseline frequency, n = 6; XREF_FIG), Epi still increased the AP firing rate in 83% (5/6 cells) of the NAm neurons (XREF_FIG).
evidence: AP discharge rate in spontaneously active neurons (-58.8 +/- 40.4% change from predrug baseline frequency, n = 6;  XREF_FIG ), Epi still increased
